_sText:
created 100% by me using a tutorial on respawning breakables
and then understand the I/O system (probably not the best looking and such)

To play the game simply press the button on the control panel.
The people playing the game will have 5 seconds to choose a side.
being in the middle cross will kill you.
Then another dramatic 5 seconds to decide who dies.
after that they will fall into a pit of poisonious water and then the game will be reset and ready to play.
